function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Contrarian views regarding infectivity and spreading of contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient samples","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Fecal-oral transmission route could prove significant","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fecal becoming an alternative route for clinical diagnostic testing for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prolonged presence of covid-19 rna in feces after respiratory tract tests negative","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global cooperation not comprehensive due to government reluctance or lack of resources","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of centralized clearing house for wbe data and knowledge","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reluctance to publicize wbe data by some governments","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of coordination and standardization in wbe pilot projects targeting covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of unified worldwide plan for wbe development","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited interest and involvement of politicians, military leaders, and government officials in wbe development","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mention of drug use may pose a risk of substance abuse and virions","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Erroneous belief in the presence of \"live\" virus in sewage","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Intense interest in the potential release of virus into surface waters","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited national reception of wbe in the u.s. for covid-19 tracking","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of cultural factors contributing to the emergence and spread of disease","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mobility patterns and trade routes facilitating the spread of infectious ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Misunderstanding of cholera transmission and causes attributed to divine theory and miasma.","category":"Society ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Persistent belief in miasma theory leading to stigmatization of urban poverty and unsanitary practices, contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Social practices and communities shaping the emergence and locations of epidemic outbreaks such as syphilis and hiv/aids in urban areas.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Historical
